title: Nice Water Park
review: this is one of biggest water park in North India. You can visit there and enjoy rides with kids. It is also under budget. So go and enjoy.

title: Nice one
review: The waterpark is very good .. very popular across the nearby places .. i have visited many times.. good place at a reasonable fare...

title: Avoid
review: Extremely dirty and excessively chlorinated water, overcrowded and overpriced (450 for adults and 350 for children). Bouncers roaming everywhere.

title: Poor maintained
review: Highly disappointing to see that agra has one water park with close to dirty pools and rides are risky  and all working on jugad

title: Good Place
review: Good water park, Although rides are less but overall it is good. Located a bit far from the city. Type of people here are good.

title: water park near fatehpur sikri
review: Over all it was worst experience ever. Rides were not working.. Whole park was and full of mosquitoes. Further staff didn't knew how to behave to their customers.

title: Dolphin
review: This is my first amusement and water park of my life when I was in class 9th...during school trip....most adventures....good food available here ....I enjoyed water disco a lot

title: Very Disappointed
review: Never visit here if you ever visited world of wonder or any other good water park, worst experience ever, water was salty and unclear also water was,t cold, changing room's and washroom not clean, slides quality very poor.

title: Disappointing
review: My son (11 years) was excited to go to this water park as he had seen it advertised as the biggest water park in Northern India.We hired a Tuktuk to take us which took about an hour. Arrived just before opening time which was 11.30. After we were inside we had to wait half an hour for some of the slides to open. Not all opened while we were there and it did not look like they would. The wave pool was closed. It was old, not well maintained and dirty in places. Would not really recommend it unless you don't mind lower standards. Some seemed to be enjoying it. We only stayed 1 hour and then left.

title: Average......
review: This is a good place to enjoy on a hot summer day. Average with limited resources... But you can enjoy with your friends..

title: dolphinthewaterworld
review: its a very good place to have fun with your near and dear ones.rides are fantastic super thrilled experience .as we are on a public place it takes time for person to reach everywhere and clean the mess as we all are educated people we should use dustbins.park entry cost is affordable .one should visit here with the family..park staff was so polite and helpful .nice place to have fun overall

title: Dolphin sucks
review: Its simply disgusting, just don't go there. Reasons are:

title: Insulting, Terrible , Poor Facility & Not Enjoyable Place
review: This Dolphine Park is Not Family Purpose Enjoying Place. Who comes person with family in this place his family is not safe in this place. some Local Person comes and insult the family ladies person and Nothing safety is here but authorised person, Bouncer and staff is also involved for this act. So I Request all the family member that No one should be go to this  types of dolphin park. Somebody has stolen purse, watches, money from the locker. Staff is involved for this act. So Please In my opinion don't go to this Dolphin Park

title: ILL Kept Water Park
review: Very shabby water park, generally bachelors come to stare females taking showers. Not advised for families and women. Risky to visit.

title: Do Not Visit
review: Strictly avoidable. VERY Dirty water, my whole family got sick after return from this pathetic place. Rides are over crowded on weekends. Food is unhygienic. Wave-pool operates on time basis and goons (bouncers behaving like one) are appointed to divided it into two sections viz male and female. my wife was left alone on one side and i was with my son.

title: Nice daybreak in summers for kids & family
review: Nice daybreak in summers for kids, family, friends & groups. Have so many different type of water slides & wave pool as well.

title: Best of best
review: i like the place very much because i have never seen this type of rides it is very interesting palace  i thought that everyone in a year must go at this place

title: Dolphin the water world
review: Good Place to visit with your family and friends Rides are amazing good parking facility and food court facility..
